Class LargeFileUpload

    Utility class for uploading large files.

                       long timeOut,
                       TimeUnit unit)
        Creates a LargeFileUpload object.
        Parameters:
        nParallelConnections - number of parallel http connections to use
        timeOut - time to wait before killing the job
        unit - time unit for the time wait value

    • Method Detail

      • upload

        public BoxFile.Info upload(BoxAPIConnection boxApi,
                           String folderId,
                           InputStream stream,
                           URL url,
                           String fileName,
                           long fileSize)
                    throws InterruptedException,
                           IOException
        Uploads a new large file.
        Parameters:
        boxApi - the API connection to be used by the upload session.
        folderId - the id of the folder in which the file will be uploaded.
        stream - the input stream that feeds the content of the file.
        url - the upload session URL.
        fileName - the name of the file to be created.
        fileSize - the total size of the file.
        Returns:
        the created file instance.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - when a thread gets interupted.
        IOException - when reading a stream throws exception.

      • upload

        public BoxFile.Info upload(BoxAPIConnection boxApi,
                           InputStream stream,
                           URL url,
                           long fileSize)
                    throws InterruptedException,
                           IOException
        Creates a new version of a large file.
        Parameters:
        boxApi - the API connection to be used by the upload session.
        stream - the input stream that feeds the content of the file.
        url - the upload session URL.
        fileSize - the total size of the file.
        Returns:
        the file instance that also contains the version information.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - when a thread gets interupted.
        IOException - when reading a stream throws exception.

      • generateDigest

        public String generateDigest(InputStream stream)
        Generates the Base64 encoded SHA-1 hash for content available in the stream. It can be used to calculate the hash of a file.
        Parameters:
        stream - the input stream of the file or data.
        Returns:
        the Base64 encoded hash string.
